about_the_game:
In a world where humans are born with an Affinity, the mark that gives them the power to control one of the four natural elements, Arane Kross grows up deprived of this gift.

Despite the taboos surrounding the use of technology, the young woman took refuge in the design of machines to try to overcome her handicap; until the day she inherits an orb capable of controlling nature: the Ecosphere.

Arane is then recruited by an order to protect the environment, the Green League, to perform her civic duty. A year of all dangers where any difference is perceived as a weakness.

A world of possibilities

In this visual novel, join the Green League and dive into a society filled with inequalities between those born with an Affinity and those without. As civil war looms between these two factions, a conspiracy breeds to overthrow the established order. What will your place be on this chessboard?

Through your interactions with the many NPCs and the choices offered throughout the game, you'll impact this universe: between benevolence and resentment, the fate of the world is in your hands.

Romanceable characters

If you wish, you can enter into romantic relationships with any of the four male and female companions who cross your path. You can also opt for sincere friendships if you prefer. Romance is not a requirement for a successful adventure. The choice is yours.

But be tactful: avoid arousing the resentment of partners who want more than simple friendship, or by multiplying love stories... You won't escape unscathed!

Dynamic choices

Based on Quick Time Event, dynamic buttons will appear during action sequences and your choices will influence the story!

Exploration phases

Explore and interact with some environments, thanks to a Point & Click system to unlock narrative content.

Interactive Computer Graphics

Clickable elements or short comic sequences will highlight key scenes.
